name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (2009)
name_original: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (2009)
description:
Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (2009) is a game developed by Stainless Games. It was originally released in 2009. Wizards of the Coast published the game.
Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (2009) is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
